title: Episode 1: The Beginning
text: Get rid of the Monday blues with our easy listening chat show, covering every basis of day to day life, Hosted by Grant Fosbraey and Jacob Jenner. Put the kettle on, or grab a cold beer and get comfy!

title: Episode 2: Music, conspiracy theories and the impact of social media
text: Come and join us for our second episode! Where we will discuss our musical background, we look into some conspiracy theories then finally exploring the impact of social media across human connection.

title: Episode 3: Hot weather, horror movie culture and technology
text: A week of basking in the sun, fulfilling our appetite for horror movies; did someone offer Grant a whiskey? let's discuss it!

title: Episode 4: A wild Jordan appears, sleep and circadian rhythm, mental health and entertainment
text: This weeks podcast we introduce our version of sideman, our tennis ball of knowledge, our internet guy: Jordan Houghton. We then speak about the importance of sleep the circadian rhythm, mental health and wellbeing and a variety of entertainment topics.

title: Episode 5: Jordan does website design, Would you rather, Introduction to Brazilian jujitsu, DC films
text: Jordan steps down from his high chair as we delve into his website design and finding out more about how this tennis ball bounces. A spin on would you rather and also an insight to Grants and Jacobs new adventure of Brazilian Jujitsu. Discussing DC/Marvel films.

title: Episode 6: Mandate Monday Q&A
text: Join us today as Grant and Jacob directly answer questions from the public! Anything we've missed? Send it in and let's chat!

title: Episode 7: A lovers tiff over education, space colonisation and other shenanigans
text: Join this week on mandate monday! Discussions regarding the governments U-turn on A level grading, the prospect of space colonisation. Join this space party and see how we planet!

title: Episode 8: Scalpers, data theft, Pokemon, gun control and more
text: Join us for this weeks chin wag where we explore the legitimacy of scalpers, the theft of our data, Pokemon and gun control laws. Its a banger!

title: Episode 9: The Jnnrcide, Reading Festival, Jordan loses at his passion, and the legitimacy of Cryptocurrency
text: Sorry we're late; Jacob's Jnnrcide almost killed us over! Join us for this weeks episode where we discuss our experience of Reading festival, Jordan getting his ass handed to him at his craft, the legitimacy of cryptocurrency vs centralised banks, solar flares, and much more! I like the way you fuck!

title: Episode 10: Mandate Monday Feat Alex James
text: Welcome to our 10th episode and as a special we are introducing our first guest!! Alex ‘Maribor’ James, joins us in the studio. Listen in now to find out how he become self sufficient in his works, owning his own record label, and what type of animal he’d be!? Check out more of Alex: @Maribor https://maribor.bandcamp.com/

title: Episode 11: A deep ocean dive, the legitimacy of charities in modern day and more!
text: All aboard as we submerge in the hidden truths around the ocean floor and fishing it. Brief look into non profit organisations. What did Jacob and Jordan have for dinner? what actor will you swap with for a day? as well as other rabbit holes and general banter.

title: Episode 12: Ghosts, mediums, near death experiences, religion and psychedelics
text: Join our reading as we explore the realm of ghosts: Discussing near death experiences to how this could work; whether it’s relative to psychedelic drugs, did this influence religion or is it to do with accent aliens? What is the truth behind all of this, is there an explanation? Why do humans need to fill the gaps of the unexplainable? Who said blackfish?
